website_summaries.verdict: A flavorful powdered iced tea by Lipton that comes in several varieties, is easy to make, and inexpensive.
pros: Powdered form is easy to mix to satisfy individual tastes
Comes in various sizes and flavors, including popular lemon and sugar-free
cons: A few repeat customers say it tastes differently than it used to

customer_reviews.title: This could become a habit!
customer_reviews.text: I am an "unsweet tea" drinker, its all I drink, but sometimes, I want something sweet and this is SO good! And so easy, I don't like most instant drinks but this one is yummy. And you do have flexibility on the strength, when Hubby makes it, he makes it strong, I like it a bit weaker, but it is entirely under our control.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: The best iced tea with lemon around
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this tea since childhood Lipton and Nestea with lemon make the best Ice T's around and Amazon sells all the different tea syrups that can be added to make your mango tea you're a peach tea.. I drink tea year-around it's my favorite drink.. I've been drinking Lipton for over 50 years now I hope they never stop making it❤
customer_reviews.author: VassarV

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor all year long!
customer_reviews.text: I can only get this locally during the summer. I drink it all year long so ordered this online. Contents of can was same great flavor but the can was missing the yellow plastic lid to seal the container after the safety seal is removed. So had to pour contents into another container for storage.
customer_reviews.author: iris5u

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite easy mix drinks.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Bottom of can was split in shipping but only tiny bit of mix was lost. Transferred to another container and spent the spent the hot summer night sipping a quick glass of this with ice. Smacked my lips loud enough to drown out the tree frogs and cicadas.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl W. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods.
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged. The powered mix canister was previous damaged before being shipped. Box was filled with bubble wrap. And mix was coming out of the box before I even opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor, huge cost savings
customer_reviews.text: There's something about Lipton that you just can't hate. This is by far the most cost advantageous way to drink flavored water I've ever found. My wife like to say that I camel drinks but with this I don't feel as bad. Rather than constantly buy more juice I'll just stir up another jug of this tea and it's ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: so make sure you like sweet tea with lemon before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: It is all right. A bit too much lemon making it difficult to even taste the tea. It also has sugar mixed in, so make sure you like sweet tea with lemon before purchasing. I did not get the nostalgia I was looking for that comes with plain old Nestea. But it is not so bad that I will throw it out either. I might just stick to making my own iced tea instead of being so rushed.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Best Iced Tea Mix!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve loved this stuff for years and for awhile I couldn’t find it in the stores I. This large container. I was very happy to find it online at a good price and with fast shipping to get me through a very hot summer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MsMeow56

customer_reviews.title: Just like grandma used to make!
customer_reviews.text: I looked FOREVER to try and find this in our local grocery stores so I was beyond happy to find it on Amazon! It takes me back to my childhood. My grandma always had this tea on the table. Love the taste. Love the price. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: shipping to rough
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff but arrived broken open and sugar powder mix got all over and in my carpet which has now caused a major ant situation. Not OK for me to have to now shampoo my carpet for rough shipping methods.
customer_reviews.author: randall

customer_reviews.title: Lipton is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for years and one day I noticed they stopped selling it at Walmart so I checked Amazon and here it is I love this stuff you can make it to your liking! I always follow the directions but sometimes it's a little sweet so I'll add more water or put less mix.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Verduzco

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic staple, tasty alone, but i mix this with an electrolyte mix (drowning it out in its sweetness and lemon tang.)
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great taste love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice tea i rinse lemons clean and i freeze them then i cut them with the peel in slices cut the slices in half put them in freezer bag when i make ice tea i add few cubes of ice and two pieces lemon and its amazing the taste plus looks great !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what is says it is
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a wedding. While I didn't receive any compliments, I definitely did not receive any complaints. This was great to make our lives easier for producing a high volume of iced tea for a wedding. I personally didn't get to try it, so I didn't want to give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalG

customer_reviews.title: BIG CONTAINER
customer_reviews.text: MY CARDIOLOGIST TOLD ME TO GIVE UP SODA POP AND DRINK NATURAL FRUIT TEA. THIS FILLS THE BILL. IT COMES IN A HUGE, HEAVY CONTAINER. IT TASTES GOOD AND I WILL BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lehnert

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend is more of a tea drinker than what ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is more of a tea drinker than what I am and he loves this type of tea. You get a lot of the powder mix for the price you pay
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size
customer_reviews.text: With this size it will be around a lot longer than the smaller size. I like this brand best.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: BOX STATUS
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived perfectly, great condition most of the items except one pasta, it was almost open but nothing to worry about. Also, the box was in very poor condition and i got very very worried but everything was okay and all was in there. Thank you very much and even if the box was in a poor condition all the items where in there so that is all that matters. Greetings. Cesar Portillo -
customer_reviews.author: Cesar  Portillo

customer_reviews.title: I love Iced Tea!
customer_reviews.text: But you know what's really great about this product? You can make a nice cup of hot tea and lemon for an evening drink. It's very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Tastes very good however one of them was punctured and leaked everywhere. Package was all sticky but wiped the good one down and tossed the bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband sucks down ice tea like it was going out of production. Best bang for my buck!
customer_reviews.author: Natali

customer_reviews.title: what kind of condition it is in when i receive it
customer_reviews.text: I really love Lipton tea but this was delivered busted open tea everywhere. When I opened the box I had to get the vacuum out to clean up the mess.
customer_reviews.author: r&L

customer_reviews.title: It tastes diffferent now
customer_reviews.text: What did you do to the flavor ?it tastes different for bad not for good, I hope is only the batch I receive and not permanent.
customer_reviews.author: Single Saver

customer_reviews.title: Taste and value
customer_reviews.text: The best iced tea you can buy. Taste is excellent. I always use with ice. The ice gives it a little extra kick.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Domenica

customer_reviews.title: Love my tea
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the amount you get. Shipped to Hawaii with no damages and in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Purchase :)  it's so Addicting, I'll NEVER buy tea bags again.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE having this on hand.. Wish Lipton would sell the Sugar Free version in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: G. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very refreshing with lots of ice.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the Lipton tea, it hits the spot on these hot days.
customer_reviews.author: jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Lipton Tea now being used for my winter drink.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious tea indeed. You can either drink this cold or hot as you might have guess and now that it's winter, I'm drinking this tea hot. I Will buy more as I need it this winter. I'm was also happy that it was wrapped very securely because one of the cans of tea that I bought earlier in the summer somehow broke open and was spilled all over the box the two cans came in.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.B.W.

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: The store I shop in locally does not carry a good iced tea with lemon/sugar mix. This came to the rescue. Good tasting. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: pema drolma

customer_reviews.title: Nice summer beverage
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this tea for years. Very refreshing for summer. Happy to be able to get such a large size
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a household staple and I got a great deal. Two canisters for under $11
customer_reviews.text: This is a household staple and I got a great deal. Two canisters for under $11.00. The only complaint I have is that there was no scoop with the iced tea. Not that big of a deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was better than the store bought instant tea that I bought the weekend before.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Garvel

customer_reviews.title: Great value in bulk.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product/purchase, Very happy. Prime purchases are wonderful for me.

customer_reviews.title: too expensive this way
customer_reviews.text: should have bought it in the store, this price was a bit too high

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Tea
customer_reviews.text: It is very tasty and has alot for the money
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Watts Mom of 5 and Grandma to 15

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get enough of this stuff, it's verging on an addiction! This is a good deal too, happy with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: HollyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Powder turned hard
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff but both containers turned hard as a rock. Like trying to scrape concrete dust. It’s a shame

customer_reviews.title: More lemon please
customer_reviews.text: I can never have too much lemon so a little bit more lemon flavor would have been nice but other than that everything else is right on

customer_reviews.title: kids enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it does not come with the measuring cup, but other than that it's tasty, kids enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis P.

customer_reviews.title: Item spilled all over the box when shipped.
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy! It spilled all over the box that it was shipped in. There was tea powder everywhere. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cherylann McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Item was not properly packaged. Should be resent to customer.
customer_reviews.text: Container was badly damaged at the bottom; contents was almost emptied inside of package. Had to throw out. Expect item to be reshipped.
customer_reviews.author: MzEhopkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Tea Mix
customer_reviews.text: I love Lipton Ice Tea mix. No other brand comes close! Tried them all & always comes back to Lipton.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrific
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product.Makes it so easy to throw into a picnic basket..don't have to worry about adding any lemons or sugar and having six smaller containers allows us to use it in several locations

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mix
customer_reviews.text: It tastes pretty good and is easy to make, but does not really taste like fresh brewed tea.
customer_reviews.author: stevenwlm

customer_reviews.title: Sweet,Tart,Tea
customer_reviews.text: Same as usual. Delicious Tea that isn't overwhelmingly lemony. Lipton has always been my go to. Lipton & Nestea

customer_reviews.title: Great Quantity For Value
customer_reviews.text: Definitely less expensive than buying elsewhere, and you get a lot more.

customer_reviews.title: OH YEAH- THAT GOOD TEA!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS DELICIOUS AND SO QUICK YOU KNOW ANYONE OVER 12 CAN MAKE A GREAT CUP OR PITCHER OF TEA!

customer_reviews.title: And super satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: The package was undamaged. Arrived quickly. And super satisfied with it. The kids and I already made a pitcher delicious!!!

customer_reviews.title: Wife’s Favorite

customer_reviews.text: I’ve been drinking this ice tea for years and oldie but goodie.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Homemade Sweet Tea
customer_reviews.text: I drink this like it's going out of style. So I appreciate having a large quantity on hand and this fills the bill.

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived on schedule and I love the quality and taste
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on schedule and I love the quality and taste. This is my second product order. My only problem was the packing had been dropped and one can was open and power was everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: we like this we should be set for a month with this amount

customer_reviews.title: The taste and quality was already great! Anyway
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt find this size in any of the markets I shop at! The taste and quality was already great! Anyway, I was glad to have it delivered to my door!

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this tea and this size is to die for! During the summer it is made in a Beautiful 128 ounce container my sister gave me for Christmas with a twist, a two (2) fingers of Vodka which makes make it an Ice Pick!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing refreshing taste for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine today and am currently enjoying my evening sipping on this delicious Iced Tea, first time trying this brand out and it’s instantly my favorite one now, definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: INCOMPLETE ORDER.
customer_reviews.text: Dont know where to go for assistance. Only half of order was delivered. Supposed to be 2 orders of 2 teas. Got only 1 order of 2 teas. want my other half of order! Box was plenty big enough for 4 teas.

customer_reviews.title: Lipton Sweetened Iced Tea Mix, Lemon, 100Ounce
customer_reviews.text: Love this mix... I either drink it like it says... but my favorite way is to turn this into wine. I make a wine that tastes like a long island iced tea.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great !!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years, nothing to dislike about it.

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY TEA I DRINK.
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, I can't get enough of this Lipton Iced tea. I tried cheaper brands at tbe grocery store but they don't have the same flavor or taste as good.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two canisters of this one arrived smashed and the iced tea mix was leaking out, seems like a waste of money to ship back, since it's garbage, but it would be nice to have it replaced, since I'm not going to use it already opened. The outside box had no damage so this was put in the box damaged which is disapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Daly

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea.
customer_reviews.text: I love this way too much. I grew up on Lipton bags sun tea, but when you put the lemon in the tea it puts an extra smile on my face.

customer_reviews.title: Very good flavor and no artificial sweeteners
customer_reviews.text: Love that there are no artificial sweeteners. And the taste is so great

customer_reviews.title: You can adjust the sweetness just by adjusting the the amount of mix to ...
customer_reviews.text: We drink this ice tea mix year round. You can adjust the sweetness just by adjusting the the amount of mix to water. It is not just a great ice tea but makes a very good hot tea.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many lemon tea mixes and prefer this one by far.

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I loved the flavor! It is a great summer and winter drink. I like it hot though..

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: so love this stuff

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is addicting.
customer_reviews.text: I probably shouldn't drink this often. Too much sugar is not good. I like that it's real sugar, flavor-wise. Need about 5-6 teaspoons for a 44 oz cup. Adopt a shelter pet.
customer_reviews.author: AdoptAPet

customer_reviews.title: For those who like their tea sweetened
customer_reviews.text: For those who like their tea sweetened, this is a good choice. It is sweet but has far fewer calories per serving than I would have expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great tea flavor
customer_reviews.text: We like the flavor of this tea above any of the instant brands. It's very sweet so we like to mix it with half home brewed tea to cut calories but straight from the container is delicious

customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast shipping as well as good tasting from a well-known brand. Wishing it came with a measuring scoop.

customer_reviews.text: No lid was shipped with the item. Once you open, rest will be a waste.

customer_reviews.title: If you like ice tea look no further
customer_reviews.text: If you like ice tea look no further. A great product with a great price. I'm not a coffee drinker and find I can drink this tea any time of the day. It is refreshing and delicious.

customer_reviews.title: Lipton Ice Tea Mix
customer_reviews.text: this ice tea mix is already sweetened and lemon flavor added. all you have to do is add the mix to a pitcher of water, stir well, and place in the fridge to chill. it is delicious anytime day or night. lipton is the most trusted name in tea. this beverage is a healthy alternative to soda. it is all natural and contains anti-oxidants for good health. drink as much as you like without any unhealthy long or short term side effects. here's to your good health! aloha. Haleiwa Jon

customer_reviews.title: tasty drink....
customer_reviews.text: great stuff for a great price . cheaper than in the local wally world for sure and you get two of them....

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting and an even better deal for the price.

customer_reviews.text: Good as always. Exactly as described. Brand Name product as shown. Lasts a long time, for multiple glasses of tea and hasn't gone bad yet.

customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and I am happy! I will ship it to my parents! They love Lipton Iced Tea and this one is perfect for refreshments!

customer_reviews.title: Great iced tea mix
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy-to-make iced tea, and comes in a generous container. I make it by the glass, although it could easily be made in larger amounts. It tastes delicious.

product_meta.title: Lipton Iced Tea Mix, Lemon 38 qt
product_meta.description: Size:95.6 Ounce (Pack of 1)| Style:LemonLipton’s expert mixologist have crafted a delicious blend of Lipton Iced Tea Mix with Lemon flavor to make the most refreshingly delicious iced tea for you and your family. Our Iced Tea Mixes are made from real tea leaves, real cane sugar and flavors sourced from natural sources, so the taste is always delicious and satisfying. Lipton iced tea mixes are the perfect addition for any of your meals because it is tasty and refreshing. So don’t just default to the usual, enjoy the sweet, Lemon filled flavor taste of Lipton Lemon Iced Tea Mix. A brilliant taste for a brighter day! Lipton Iced Tea Mixes are the easiest way to prepare delicious and refreshing iced tea in just seconds. Just pour 4 tbsp of Lipton Iced Tea Mix in a glass, add 1 cup of cold water and enjoy a perfect glass of iced tea! This iced tea mix makes 38 quarts of iced tea. At Lipton we never compromise on quality. Only the best tea leaves go into our iced tea mixes. All our tea leaves are sourced from around the world and expertly blended so you can enjoy a premium quality experience. You will reward yourself with the fresh, delicious taste that makes iced tea a great choice.
feature_bullets: Enjoy Iced Tea in seconds with Refreshing & Delicious Lipton black iced tea lemon mix
Made from real tea leaves and colors & flavors from natural sources
Tasty & Refreshing Lipton Black Iced Tea Lemon Mix is the perfect addition to any meal
Most convenient way to prepare iced tea: Simply add Lipton Iced Tea Mix to water and add ice
